shri lankawa thula
toronto hi amarikanu thanapathi karyalaya idiripita udghoshakayo pikat kalaha.
edina rathri aaharayen pasu rohana rupawahiniya narambau athara jawipe magin sidukala bawata chodana karamin rupawahiniyen wikashanaya wu prawruththi pilibadawa siya nosathuta pala kaleya.

mehi senapathi yanuwen sandahan wanne nanda mithra senawiya bawa paranawithana mahathage adahasayi.
ehema kale minissunwa rawattala ee gana thiyena wirodhaya adu karanna.
ithin ee dinuma harin thaniyen gatha aathal ekak misak wena mokawath noweya.
